title: com.apple.finder
description: The payload for configuring Finder settings.

ShowExternalHardDrivesOnDesktop.title: Show External Hard Drives On Desktop
ShowExternalHardDrivesOnDesktop.description: If false, external hard drives don’t appear on the Desktop. Default: true

WarnOnEmptyTrash.title: Warn On Empty Trash
WarnOnEmptyTrash.description: If false, the user isn’t warned before emptying the trash. Default: true

ShowMountedServersOnDesktop.title: Show Mounted Servers On Desktop
ShowMountedServersOnDesktop.description: If false, mounted file servers don’t appear on the Desktop. Default: false

ShowHardDrivesOnDesktop.title: Show Hard Drives On Desktop
ShowHardDrivesOnDesktop.description: If false, internal hard drives don’t appear on the Desktop. Default: false

Prohibit Eject.title: Prohibit Eject
Prohibit Eject.description: If true, the system disables Eject. Default: false

ShowRemovableMediaOnDesktop.title: Show Removable Media On Desktop
ShowRemovableMediaOnDesktop.description: If false, removable media items don’t appear on the Desktop. Default: true

ProhibitBurn.title: Prohibit Burn
ProhibitBurn.description: If true, the system disables the Finder’s burn support. Default: false

ProhibitGoToFolder.title: Prohibit Go To Folder
ProhibitGoToFolder.description: If true, the system disables Go to Folder. Default: false

ProhibitConnectTo.title: Prohibit Connect To
ProhibitConnectTo.description: If true, the system disables Connect to Server. Default: false
